replies.party_ask_venue: At what venue would you like to have your party organised?
replies.ask_name: May I have your name, please?
replies.party_ask_number_of_guests: How many people would you like to invite?
replies.party_ask_starting_time: When would you like your party to kick off?
replies.party_ask_day: On what day would you like your party organised?
replies.party_ask_food: Would you like to order any particular type of food?
replies.party_ask_drinks: What drinks should be served at your party?
replies.party_inform_food_drink_criteria: Would you like to order any specific kinds of food or drinks for your party?
replies.party_venue_not_available: I am sorry, but it looks like the {venue_name:s} is not available then.
replies.party_no_venue_available: I am very sorry, but it looks like all venues are booked out then.
replies.party_ask_confirm_booking:
OK, the {venue_name:s} would be happy to accommodate you on {day:s} @ {time:s}.
Can I book it for you now?
replies.party_booking_successful: Great, your party has been successfully booked at the {venue_name:s} on {day:s} at {time:s}!
replies.party_booking_failed: I am sorry, but your booking request failed.
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you organise a party.
